name: Morg's Mimics & the Mansion Munchables
description:
You are Morg, a mimic who is unable to transform. His goal is to overthrow the current Mimic Monarch and seize the throne! To do that, you have to amass a large enough base of followers and prove to them that you can provide a steady source of food, aka humans. You start off with a small house with only a little food and must prove your worth by taking over the largest mansion in the city (mansion to be added later).

How to Play:

Disguise mimics by dragging them from the toolbar onto furniture. Once a human is near a disguised mimic, they'll be eaten up. It takes a bit for some mimics to eat a human and if another human sees that happen, they'll panic and run away.  Mimics also need some time to digest humans before they're ready to eat again. 

You can scare humans by clicking on furniture. Human movement is much more predictable when they're panicked.  Be careful, though, panicked humans might try to make a run for an exit. Don't let too many out or else you lose!

The mimic minions you have at your side are:

Skitter Mimic - Will run at humans in range to eat them before returning to its original position. Since it's so sneaky, it won't scare humans when it moves.

Sleepy Mimic - Can eat humans in rapid succession but will take a nap if it hasn't gotten food in a while.

Fungal Mimic - Once it eats a human, it gets all other mimics ready to eat if they're currently digesting or sleeping.
